promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical ibex electric-type pokemon wearing yellow and black bracers. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltibexa, a a chibi cute mythical ibex electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Thundering Hurricane-GX, Resonate. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "electric" or "Voltibexa". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ibex-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: This petite, mythical urban dweller, known for Thundering Hurricane-GX and Resonate, brightens cityscapes. Nimble as a mountain goat, it channels stormy power while frolicking among skyscrapers.
